alert.note: Alert for Price; Sawyer (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 7:01AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Price and southeastern Sawyer Counties through 730 AM CDT... At 700 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Hawkins, or 10 miles northeast of Ladysmith, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Connors Lake and Loretta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
